name: updateNetworkSettings
description: Update the settings for a network

localStatusPage.description: A hash of Local Status page(s)' authentication options applied to the Network.

authentication.description: A hash of Local Status page(s)' authentication options applied to the Network.

enabled.description: Enables / disables the authentication on Local Status page(s).

password.description: The password used for Local Status Page(s). Set this to null to clear the password.

localStatusPageEnabled.description: Enables / disables the local device status pages (my.meraki.com, ap.meraki.com, switch.meraki.com, wired.meraki.com). Optional (defaults to false)

remoteStatusPageEnabled.description: Enables / disables access to the device status page (http://[device's LAN IP]). Optional. Can only be set if localStatusPageEnabled is set to true

securePort.description: A hash of SecureConnect options applied to the Network.

enabled.description: Enables / disables SecureConnect on the network. Optional.

$ul: **expireDataBefore**: The date to expire the data before
**expireDataOlderThan**: The number of days, weeks, or months in Epoch time to expire the data before
**fips**: A hash of FIPS options applied to the Network
**enabled**: Enables / disables FIPS on the network.
**localStatusPage**: A hash of Local Status page(s)' authentication options applied to the Network.
**authentication**: A hash of Local Status page(s)' authentication options applied to the Network.
**enabled**: Enables / disables the authentication on Local Status page(s).
**username**: The username used for Local Status Page(s).
**localStatusPageEnabled**: Enables / disables the local device status pages (my.meraki.com, ap.meraki.com, switch.meraki.com, wired.meraki.com). Optional (defaults to false)
**namedVlans**: A hash of Named VLANs options applied to the Network.
**enabled**: Enables / disables Named VLANs on the Network.
**remoteStatusPageEnabled**: Enables / disables access to the device status page (http://[device's LAN IP]). Optional. Can only be set if localStatusPageEnabled is set to true
**securePort**: A hash of SecureConnect options applied to the Network.
**enabled**: Enables / disables SecureConnect on the network. Optional.
